About the blog:

I am super happy that you have found my little side of the internet. On here you will find a few very diffrent (but often still intertwined) topics. My main interests are in coding/developing and politics/political science. I developed my own blog from scratch (well cause I like doing that) to have a place where I can explore the intersection between them and individually.

About the Me:

My name is Mark and I currently live in Frankfurt Germany. I work as a backend developer and love coding, cooking, coffee and politics.

I hold a Bachelors degree in Political Sciences and a minor in American Studies. During my studies I discovered that I like to work with and analyze data for analysis. This then led me to becoming a developer. My "primary" programming language is Python (web,data and everything essentially) but I also write the typical amount of JS etc. and Golang. Go has particularly peaked my interest as of late as well as AstroJS with which this blog was developed.
